content.GPT-summary: The post titled "Extending Credit vs. Investing" contains several images related to the topic. However, there is no discussion or explanation of the proposal itself, and no feedback or collaboration is requested or offered.
GPT-discussion-categories: This is not a discussion, but the proposal itself

content.content: So you are telling MakerDAO. “There is still a chance”? Be interesting to hear the 6s take on how either of these leads to further DAI collateral centralization vs. decentralization, and how to risk spread with multiple AOs(Asset originators, managers).   Also comments regarding how to manage the size of the problem 3.5B. One thing of note it also might be nice to hear on. What happens if as @rune and others are suggesting DAI depegs from $$ and floats value to either/both of the above. Always appreciated the expensive and hard work 6s did here and the continued engagement with MakerDAO generally.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: MakerMan:  What happens if as @rune and others are suggesting DAI depegs from $$ and floats value to either/both of the above.   I tossed the idea of allowing a gradual float over the course of 50 years into discord, but others thought that was too long a timespan. I do think it’s in Maker’s (very) long term interest to de-peg, but any rapid action in that regard is going to make it very difficult to bring more collateral onboard, and increases the probability of a fatal bank run.
